original_text: The side rooms were on three levels. Each level had 30 rooms. The temple's wall at each level was less thick than the wall below. So the wall itself held up each level of rooms. They did not have to fix the side rooms into the temple's wall.
korean_text: 골방은 삼 층인데 골방 위에 골방이 있어 모두 서른이라 그 삼면 골방이 성전 벽 밖으로 그 벽에 붙어 있는 성전 벽 속을 뚫지는 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: The side rooms were on three levels
sentences.korean_translation: 측면 방들은 세 개의 층으로 이루어져 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The temple's wall at each level
was less thick than the wall below
So the wall itself held up
They did not have to fix
the side rooms into the temple's wall
